author: John Power
title: Trump says he signed bill to release Epstein files - Al Jazeera
description: Epstein Files Transparency Act compels release of unclassified materials in searchable format within 30 days.
content:
United States President Donald Trump has announced he has signed a bill ordering the release of files related to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
